synopsis: In this engaging episode of Pineapple Blunt Rotation, hosts Devam and Ahir, along with guest Garrett Gerrito, dive deep into the complex topics of body image and the gym. They share personal stories, explore the impact of societal standards, and emphasize the importance of self-acceptance and positive relationships with fitness.
quotes: The horror persists, but so do we.
You have to get in to get out.
If you want to make a change to your body, you should also be going to the gym because it's something you enjoy.
Comparison is the thief of joy.
The strongest people are usually the nicest and most humble.
You shouldn't look like that; that's not realistic.
If you drink more water, your life will improve.
It's important to be mindful of how comparison is negatively impacting your self-image.
Everyone has dealt with the same thoughts at some point.
Don't force yourself to go to the gym if you really hate it; find something you enjoy.
